North_Las_Vegas.Poker Palace:
Poker Palace is a locals casino located at 2757 North Las Vegas Boulevard in North Las Vegas, Nevada, near Nellis Air Force Base.


== History ==
The property was constructed in 1951, and initially operated as Bunny's Bar, popular among employees of the nearby Nellis Air Force Base. In April 1974, Marvin E. Coleman (also known as Mickey Coleman) and his wife, Laura Coleman, purchased 0.48 acres (0.19 ha) of land, including the bar.
